Board of Directors

  1. Home
  2. About
  3. Board of Directors

Our Team

The company is controlled by the Government and is functioning under the Ministry of Labour, Government of Kerala. The Director Board in ODEPC is appointed by the Government of the state. The Board members are comprised of senior Government Officials including officers from the Indian Administrative Service.

Board Of Directors

Members of the Board are:

Adv. K P Anilkumar

Chairman, ODEPC Ltd

Shri. Anoop K A

Managing Director, ODEPC Ltd

Shri. G. Sreeni

Joint Secretary to Government, Finance Department, Government of Kerala

Sri Binu P R

Deputy Secretary to Government, Finance Department, Government of Kerala

Shri. V. N. Purushothama Kaimal

CMS 137, Rohini, Cherthala
